Detailed Description

Class representing a file that uses the PRAY format .creature, .family and .agents files all use this format.

PRAYFile::GetBlocks ( $  type = FALSE  ) 

Gets the blocks of the specified type(s) If $type is a string, returns all blocks of that type. If $type is an array, returns all blocks the types in the array.

Parameters:
$type The type(s) of blocks to return, as the PRAYBLOCK_TYPE_* constants.

PRAYFile::ParseBlockHeader (  )  [private]

Reads a block from the reader Reads a block, then creates it using the PrayBlock::MakePrayBlock method. Returns true if the block was created successfully, false otherwise.
